sentence: And when youre competing against Ron DeSantis and Greg Abbott for national Republican attention, shooting hoops isnt going to cut the mustard.?
title: Youngkins move to force Loudoun school board elections called troubling

sentence: Im not looking to kiss anybodys a-- he seems like a decent guy, Im glad he won, but you have to take some cues from Ron DeSantis, who enforces the law down here in Florida," Bongino said.
title: Bongino calls on Virginia officials to prosecute Alito protesters under 'right to tranquility' law
